outputs.output_descr: The objective of this project is to strengthen the efforts of the Government of Egypt in cooperating with various stakeholders in the process of building the nation's information society.This is to be achieved through ; a) universal access policies and strategies developed and upgraded, b) ICT applications supported, c) innovation enhanced, d) legal and regulatory enabling environment created, e) human resources training & development support, f) knowledge sharing and internal management support systems established.

project_descr: Empowering and Connecting the Community through ICT:  Egypt - Emergence of the Regional Digital Hub'
